Class Customer

java.lang.Object
com.foodora.user.User
com.foodora.user.Customer
public class Customer extends User
Represents a customer in the Foodora system. Customers can place orders, manage their fidelity cards, and receive notifications.

  • Field Summary

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder(Order order)
      Places a new order and applies any applicable fidelity discounts.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if order is null or invalid

    • registerFidelityCard

      public void registerFidelityCard(FidelityCard card)
      Registers a new fidelity card for the customer.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if card is null

    • unregisterFidelityCard

      public void unregisterFidelityCard()
      Unregisters from current fidelity program and reverts to basic card.

      Sends a notification about a special offer if notifications are enabled.

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints(int pts)
      Adds points to the customer's fidelity account.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if points is negative

    • deductPoints

      public void deductPoints(int pts)
      Deducts points from the customer's fidelity account.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if points is negative or insufficient balance
